channel.title: Category definition for Useful Links
channel.description:
Find something really great other Bootstrappers could learn from? Post it up.
This category is experimental, but I know I come across useful links pretty often and having a place to discuss them and add to them beyond just sharing them on Twitter seems useful. It will also hopefully become a central place to look for "that cool article on X" vs searching the entire forum, twitter, etc.

item.title: Category definition for Useful Links
item.dc:creator: ian
item.description:
This topic is now pinned. It will appear at the top of its category until it is either unpinned by a moderator, or the Clear Pin button is pressed.

Read full topic
